title: What is bugsplat?
body: I keep trying to start the game but whenever I click "launch" I get a message that says BugSplat.dll is missing. Is there a page or site where I can download that?

replies.body:
This issue typically occurs as a result of League not operating with the specific administrative privileges it requires. I recommend [configuring your system permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to ensure League can operate correctly.

Let me know if this caused any change.
